verses.verse: Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord:<WH3068> "Behold,<WH2009> I am going to arouse<WH5782> against<WH5921> Babylon<WH894> And against<WH413> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Leb-kamai The spirit<WH7307> of a destroyer.<WH7843>

"And I shall dispatch<WH7971> foreigners<WH2114> to Babylon<WH894> that they may winnow<WH2219> her And may devastate<WH1238> her land;<WH776> For on every<WH5439> side<WH5439> they will be opposed<WH5921> to her In the day<WH3117> of [her] calamity.<WH9567>

"Let not him who bends<WH1869> his bow<WH7198> bend<WH1869> [it,] Nor<WH413> let him rise<WH5927> up in his scale-armor; So do not spare<WH2550> her young<WH970> men;<WH970> Devote<WH2763> all<WH3605> her army<WH6635> to destruction.<WH2763>
"And they will fall<WH5307> down<WH5307> slain<WH2491> in the land<WH776> of the Chaldeans,<WH3778> And pierced<WH1856> through<WH1856> in their streets.<WH2351>"

For neither<WH3808> Israel<WH3478> nor<WH3808> Judah<WH3063> has been forsaken<WH488> By his God,<WH430> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> Although<WH3588> their land<WH776> is full<WH4390> of guilt<WH817> Before<WH4480> the Holy<WH6918> One<WH6918> of Israel.<WH3478>

Flee<WH5127> from the midst<WH8432> of Babylon,<WH894> And each<WH376> of you save<WH4422> his life!<WH5315> Do not be destroyed<WH1826> in her punishment,<WH5771> For this<WH1931> is the Lord's time<WH6256> of vengeance;<WH5360> He is going to render<WH9608> recompense<WH1576> to her.

Babylon<WH894> has been a golden<WH2091> cup<WH3563> in the hand<WH3027> of the Lord,<WH3068> Intoxicating<WH7937> all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776> The nations<WH1471> have drunk<WH8354> of her wine;<WH3196> Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> the nations<WH1471> are going<WH1984> mad.<WH1984>
Suddenly<WH6597> Babylon<WH894> has fallen<WH5307> and been broken;<WH7665> Wail<WH3213> over<WH5921> her! Bring<WH3947> balm<WH6875> for her pain;<WH4341> Perhaps<WH194> she may be healed.<WH7495>

We applied healing<WH7495> to Babylon,<WH894> but she was not healed;<WH7495> Forsake<WH5800> her and let us each<WH376> go<WH1980> to his own country,<WH776> For her judgment<WH4941> has reached<WH5060> to heaven<WH8064> And towers<WH5375> up to the very skies.<WH7834>

Lift<WH5375> up a signal<WH5251> against<WH413> the walls<WH2346> of Babylon;<WH894> Post<WH2388> a strong<WH2388> guard,<WH4929> Station<WH6965> sentries,<WH8104> Place<WH3559> men in ambush!<WH693> For the Lord<WH3068> has both<WH1571> purposed<WH2161> and performed<WH6213> What<WH834> He spoke<WH1696> concerning<WH413> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Babylon.<WH894>
O you who dwell<WH7931> by many<WH7227> waters,<WH4325> Abundant<WH7227> in treasures,<WH214> Your end<WH7093> has come,<WH935> The measure<WH520> of your end.<WH1215>

The Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> has sworn<WH7650> by Himself:<WH5315> "Surely<WH3588> <WH518> I will fill<WH4390> you with a population<WH120> like locusts,<WH3218> And they will cry<WH9420> out with shouts<WH1959> of victory over<WH5921> you."

[It is] He who made<WH6213> the earth<WH776> by His power,<WH3581> Who established<WH3559> the world<WH8398> by His wisdom,<WH2451> And by His understanding<WH8394> He stretched<WH5186> out the heavens.<WH8064>

When He utters<WH5414> His voice,<WH6963> [there is] a tumult<WH1995> of waters<WH4325> in the heavens,<WH8064> And He causes the clouds<WH9347> to ascend<WH5927> from the end<WH7097> of the earth;<WH776> He makes<WH6213> lightning<WH1300> for the rain,<WH4306> And brings<WH3318> forth<WH3318> the wind<WH7307> from His storehouses.<WH214>

All<WH3605> mankind<WH120> is stupid,<WH9059> devoid<WH4480> of knowledge;<WH1847> Every<WH3605> goldsmith<WH6884> is put<WH954> to shame<WH954> by his idols,<WH6459> For his molten<WH9333> images<WH9333> are deceitful,<WH8267> And there is no<WH3808> breath<WH7307> in them.
They are worthless,<WH1892> a work<WH4639> of mockery;<WH8595> In the time<WH6256> of their punishment<WH6486> they will perish.

The portion<WH2506> of Jacob<WH3290> is not like these;<WH428> For the Maker<WH3335> of all<WH3605> is He, And of the tribe<WH7626> of His inheritance;<WH5159> The Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> is His name.<WH8034>
[He says,] "You are My war-club<WH4421>, [My] weapon<WH3627> of war; And with you I shatter<WH5310> nations,<WH1471> And with you I destroy<WH7843> kingdoms.<WH4467>
"And with you I shatter<WH5310> the horse<WH5483> and his rider,<WH7392>

And with you I shatter<WH5310> the chariot<WH7393> and its rider,<WH7392> And with you I shatter<WH5310> man<WH376> and woman,<WH802> And with you I shatter<WH5310> old<WH2205> man<WH376> and youth,<WH5288> And with you I shatter<WH5310> young<WH970> man<WH970> and virgin,<WH1330>

"But I will repay<WH9608> Babylon<WH894> and all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Chaldea<WH3778> for all<WH3605> their evil<WH9567> that they have done<WH6213> in Zion<WH6726> before your eyes,<WH5869>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

"And they will not take<WH3947> from you [even] a stone<WH68> for a corner<WH6438> Nor<WH3808> a stone<WH68> for foundations,<WH4144> But you will be desolate<WH8077> forever,<WH5769>" declares<WH5002> the Lord.<WH3068>

Lift<WH5375> up a signal<WH5251> in the land,<WH776> Blow<WH8628> a trumpet<WH7782> among the nations!<WH1471> Consecrate<WH6942> the nations<WH1471> against<WH5921> her, Summon<WH8085> against<WH5921> her the kingdoms<WH4467> of Ararat,<WH780> Minni<WH4508> and Ashkenaz;<WH813> Appoint<WH6485> a marshal<WH2951> against<WH5921> her, Bring<WH5927> up the horses<WH5483> like bristly<WH5569> locusts.<WH3218>

Consecrate<WH6942> the nations<WH1471> against<WH5921> her, The kings<WH4428> of the Medes,<WH4074> Their governors<WH6346> and all<WH3605> their prefects,<WH5461> And every<WH3605> land<WH776> of their dominion.<WH4475>

So the land<WH776> quakes<WH7493> and writhes,<WH9123> For the purposes<WH4284> of the Lord<WH3068> against<WH5921> Babylon<WH894> stand,<WH6965> To make<WH7760> the land<WH776> of Babylon<WH894> A desolation<WH8047> without<WH369> inhabitants.<WH3427>

The mighty<WH1368> men<WH1368> of Babylon<WH894> have ceased<WH2308> fighting,<WH3898> They stay<WH3427> in the strongholds;<WH4679> Their strength<WH1369> is exhausted,<WH5405> They are becoming<WH1961> [like] women;<WH802> Their dwelling<WH4908> places<WH4908> are set<WH3341> on fire,<WH3341> The bars<WH1280> of her [gates] are broken.<WH7665>

One courier<WH7323> runs<WH7323> to meet<WH7122> another,<WH7323> And one messenger<WH5046> to meet<WH7122> another,<WH5046> To tell<WH5046> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> That his city<WH5892> has been captured<WH3920> from end<WH7097> [to end;]
The fords<WH9278> also have been seized,<WH8610> And they have burned<WH8313> the marshes<WH98> with fire,<WH784> And the men<WH376> of war<WH4421> are terrified.<WH926>

For thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> "The daughter<WH1323> of Babylon<WH894> is like a threshing<WH1637> floor<WH1637> At the time<WH6256> it is stamped<WH1869> firm;<WH1869> Yet<WH5750> in a little<WH4592> while<WH4592> the time<WH6256> of harvest<WH7105> will come<WH935> for her."

"Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> has devoured<WH398> me [and] crushed<WH2000> me, He has set<WH3322> me down<WH3322> [like] an empty<WH7386> vessel;<WH3627> He has swallowed<WH1104> me like a monster,<WH8577> He has filled<WH4390> his stomach<WH3770> with my delicacies;<WH5730> He has washed<WH1740> me away.<WH1740>

"May the violence<WH2555> [done] to me and to my flesh<WH7607> be upon Babylon,<WH894>" The inhabitant<WH3427> of Zion<WH6726> will say;<WH559> And, "May my blood<WH1818> be upon the inhabitants<WH3427> of Chaldea,<WH3778>" Jerusalem<WH3389> will say.<WH559>

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> "Behold,<WH2009> I am going to plead<WH7378> your case<WH7379> And exact<WH5358> full<WH5360> vengeance<WH5360> for you; And I shall dry<WH9162> up her sea<WH3220> And make<WH3001> her fountain<WH4726> dry.<WH3001>
"And Babylon<WH894> will become<WH1961> a heap<WH1530> [of ruins,] a haunt<WH4583> of jackals,<WH8565> An object<WH8047> of horror<WH8047> and hissing,<WH8322> without<WH369> inhabitants.<WH3427>
"They will roar<WH7580> together<WH9191> like young<WH3715> lions,<WH3715> They will growl<WH5286> like lions' cubs.<WH1484>

"I shall bring<WH3381> them down<WH3381> like lambs<WH3733> to the slaughter,<WH2873> Like rams<WH352> together<WH5973> with male<WH6260> goats.<WH6260>

Even<WH1571> the wall<WH2346> of Babylon<WH894> has fallen<WH5307> down!<WH5307>

and say,<WH559> 'Just<WH3602> so<WH3602> shall Babylon<WH894> sink<WH8257> down<WH8257> and not rise<WH6965> again, because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the calamity<WH9567> that I am going to bring<WH935> upon her; and they will become<WH3286> exhausted.<WH3286>' "Thus<WH2008> far<WH5704> are the words<WH1697> of Jeremiah.<WH3414>
